NK002(kha)005:1: sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i sku //
NK002(kha)005:3: dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa chos kyi sku //
NK002(kha)005:4: 'gro drug sems can rnams la spyan ras gzigs //
NK002(kha)005:5: nam mkha' lta bur khyab pa'i thugs rje can //
NK002(kha)005:6: gzi brjid 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)005:7: phyag stong 'khor los chos sku dge slong dpal mo zla ba gzhon nu dang //
NK002(kha)005:8: ye shes bzang po zla ba rgyal mtshan dang //
NK002(kha)005:9: 'gro la phan bzhed rgyal sras snying stobs can //
NK002(kha)005:10: brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK002(kha)005:11: rgya gar pan chen ston pa bla thabs mkhas 'jig
NK002(kha)005:12: rten 'dren thugs rje kun gzhon nu'i cha lugs skyon
NK002(kha)005:13: gyis ma lha dang lha stobs po che la drag
NK002(kha)005:14: shul che // rigs sngags rgyal po dge ba can //
NK002(kha)005:15: gdul dka' po dag 'dul ba po //
